sys_ui_action.name: Remote Management - RDP
sys_ui_action.onclick: Run() function Run(){var configItem=g_form.getDisplayBox("cmdb_ci").value; if (configItem==''){g_form.addErrorMessage('You cannot run Remote Tools when the Configuration Item field is empty. Please specify a Configuration Item before attempting.');} else {var gr=new GlideRecord('cmdb_ci');gr.addQuery('name',configItem);gr.query();while(gr.next()){var Host=gr.name;classname=gr.sys_class_name;if(classname=='cmdb_ci_computer'){var gr1=new GlideRecord(classname);var ciHost;gr1.addQuery('name',configItem);gr1.query();while(gr1.next()){ciHost=gr1.fqdn;}RunRDP1(ciHost);}else{var gr2=new GlideRecord(classname);var ciHost;gr2.addQuery('name',configItem);gr2.query();while(gr2.next()){ciHost=gr2.host_name;}RunRDP2(ciHost);}}}}
